sentences.sContent: The researchers demonstrate that it is possible to generate odor in a compact device that can fit on the back of a TV with potentially thousands of odors.
sentences.sContent_eng: The researchers demonstrate that it is possible to generate odor in a compact device that can fit on the back of a TV with potentially thousands of odors.
sentences.sCn: 研究员表示，将一个可以散发上千种气味的小型设备安装在电视背后，从而实现电视(根据情景)生成气味是可能的。

phrases.pCn: 臭气控制，气味控制；四氟化硅处理

words.tran: 臭的，散发气味的；芬芳的
洒香水于；给…添味，给…加臭味
